thread.title: Fantastic Hotel -
thread.title_full: Fantastic Hotel - Review of Hotel Madrid, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Pinkbird21
title: Fantastic Hotel -
text:
This Hotel was great. Our rooms were large and the staff were very helpful. The breakfast was a great buffet and the room on the 5th floor had wonderful views.
The location is great with the Spanish steps and metro stop only minutes away.
Would definitely stay here again and wouldn't hesitate to recommend this Hotel.
